website_summaries.verdict: The price is high, but it offers eight output ports from one input port without any loss of video quality.
pros: You'll pay a little extra, but for someone who needs 8 output ports, this unit works well
Excellent all-metal construction ensures the device will not overheat
Supports HDMI v1.4 standard and a variety of video resolutions up to 4K
cons: Some lag time when changing channels

customer_reviews.title: Works Great! Using For Ps3 To Elagto HD60 S!
customer_reviews.text: Works Perfect! Im using this for my ps3 to Elgato hd60 s!
customer_reviews.author: Clint Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Used almost every day for over 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Solid build, reliable. Have been using one between our kitchen and living room for a while now. When the second display comes on, there is a short 2-3 seconds interruption in the HDMI signal (maybe some HDCP or other kind of handshake), it never fails to settle after less than 3 seconds. All is running at 1080p@60. I have not done much with various audio modes. We only car about basic PCM. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Lunardi

customer_reviews.title: This device does the job.
customer_reviews.text: It keeps the picture clear at 1080p on both projector and TV. The only drawback is that if my Cable Provider (Verizon) provides a 4K reception on my TV my projector which goes up to 1080p and is not 4K will not allow it to happen as it will limit it to 1080p on both units. Therefore no 4K. I have contacted the manufacturer and they told me that another model will handle this probem. I am waiting for more 4K content with Verizon before I purchase the other model which costs more.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbyd

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: used for outdoor TV to save on bringing a second box
customer_reviews.author: alena b.

customer_reviews.title: Powered splitter makes the difference
customer_reviews.text: We used this to split signal between tv and monitor. Power made the difference
customer_reviews.author: Dustin T.

customer_reviews.title: Fix for TIvo Bolt HDMI issues
customer_reviews.text: Bought to solve problem of TV HDMI input losing connection with TiVo Bolt. It has solved that problem. I have not tested to see if it removes HDCP.
customer_reviews.author: trapperpg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: It does what its supposed to do. What else can I tell you. If you need it, BUY IT! The quality is exceptional as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Works fine with Fios, one TV and one Projector.  Make sure it is the HDS-102 not HD-102.
customer_reviews.text: I have Fios in my living room. Installed an inexpensive projector in the bedroom. This box gave me what I wanted. To watch in either room. Make sure to get this one if similar because the HD-102 will work but the signal to the projector will go from 1080i to 720.. Has to be HDS-102. Note - I contacted support by email on a weekend and they responded within an hour. Recommended the HDS-102 to solve my signal downgrade with the HD-102. Fantastic that support was so quick to get back to me. You don't find that too often these days and will go a long way with me buying other products from them if needed.
customer_reviews.author: tzm

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Splitting 1 to 3 and it works great, have not needed tech support. Very easy to understand and hook up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4K HDMI Splitter
customer_reviews.text: I needed a splitter to send the same signal to my monitor through two different routes, one straight from the cable box and another routed through my receiver. This allows me to switch inputs into the monitor. Sometimes I switch the input so that I get tv on my monitor while streaming music through my receiver into my speaker array. I can then watch the televised signal, such as sports, while listening to music. This works perfectly for my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: SavannahBarks

customer_reviews.title: Nice way to share one signal on two TV's
customer_reviews.text: Delivers a great picture to both sets from one source. Great for avoiding having to purchase two receivers for Cable or satellite TV. Our setup has a RF remote for the receiver box so we can use the remote in either room. I just used a long HDMI cable from one room to the other. Voilå! Follow up: Purchased an antenna and a Tivo Roamio OTA box. Works really well and still can use the HDMI splitter to watch on two TVs. The remote for the Tivo is RF, also.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Watson Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: First one came and stopped working within two weeks. They were supposed to send a replacement, and instead sent me a completely different product. I'm now stuck with a defective original product to send back, and now this other item. I no longer have an option to exchange this product, as they want me to just send both back for a refund. Just trying to buy an HDMI splitter shouldn't involve all of this back and forth. Very unfortunate, seeing how others have had good luck with these. I will take my business elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Kassulke

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Compact,Effective.
customer_reviews.text: My apartment building furnishes internet service from a common WIFI. I have only one HDMI output from my five year old computer. I use the splitter to drive 1) a wall-mounted 32-inch smart TV, used as a monitor at my desk (saves space on my desk) and 2) a separate larger smart TV across the room (25-ft HDMI cable) for both cable TV and streamed video from the internet (that TV has two HDMI input receptacles, one for the cable modem and one for the computer for streaming). This works fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lou S.

customer_reviews.title: Good splitter
customer_reviews.text: This is the second I have bought. Both are great and in this case replaced one that had died on me. I chose this one because it works so well in the other place I have it used. The only issue I have with it, is that it requires power and the USB cable is included, BUT no plug. If you have old phone/tablet plugs around, it is easy. But I did not have any so, I had to put in a new multi-plug with USB ports to have power. This is why I knocked it 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Proctor

customer_reviews.title: Church Setting Projector & LCD TV
customer_reviews.text: This thing works perfect for what I need it, in church to connect powerpoint to a projector and an lcd tv simultaneously. I'm using a MacBook Pro and it works just fine. The projector is 1280x800 and the tv is 1080p. I set it to the projector's native resolution and the tv adjusts accordingly. I thought there might be a problem since they are different resolutions (16:10 & 16:9) but it worked flawlessly. I suppose the lcd tv's native ability to adjust to different resolutions plays a part. Another older tv wouldn't work. I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: James Y. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Splitter does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction. Looks great. Using it for the 4K capable signal out of our Altice One MINI cable box in the bedroom and the Bluray DVD player to the 4K TV. We're using the REI HDS-102 splitter to send the Altice TV signal out to both the 4K TV and the Slingbox HD (with a standard HDMI cable since the Slingbox is "only" 1080i capable). The 4K channel 200 looks fantastic in UHD. Superbowl should be fun to see in 4K.
customer_reviews.author: David H. Tremper

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I tried use this running out of the display port on my laptop so that I could use my HTC VIVE in conjunction with a large computer monitor. Sadly this would not detect any type of signal from my HDMI out port, and I know for a fact there is nothing wrong with the port as it works solo with everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Street

customer_reviews.title: Great HDMI Splitter.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed! Plugged the HDMI cable from my graphics card on my computer and one output to my computer monitor, the other output to my 50" LG smart TV. Now I can see any video on my computer also on my TV. I can watch Netflix movies, Amazon Prime Movies, YouTube Movies . Works great.
customer_reviews.author: JELSR

customer_reviews.title: Has worked flawlessly for about 4 months where others have failed far earlier
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other HDMI splitters and matrix switches with mixed results and often had ports that went dead, dropped signals, and synch failures. Frustrating and probably typical unless you want to pay big bucks for professional grade equipment. However this little splitter has worked fine so far with no ports going dead and no drop-outs. I use a mix of 2 Visio screens, 1 LG, and one Dell monitor with a HDMI to DVI adapter cable. All connect and synch perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Toolmanjsp

customer_reviews.title: What you need for your Slingbox
customer_reviews.text: My cable box doesn't have Component outputs so I bought this because I needed two HDMI outputs from my cable box, one for the TV and one for the Slingbox. You also will need a HDMI to Component converter (which Amazon conveniently has, the one I used looks sort of like a squid) but without this splitter it doesn't work. Literally plug and play. Configure the Slingbox for Comcast and X1 and you're in business.
customer_reviews.author: Bart

customer_reviews.title: Can finally capture all of my video games for streaming
customer_reviews.text: Some parts of the games I play get blocked due to HDCP. This allows me to capture those moments instead of "breaking immersion". My package didn't come with an actual power adapter that goes into a wall outlet, just USB. So you may need to also purchase a USB to Wall outlet adapter, or contact Amazon and they will replace the whole package no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle S.

customer_reviews.title: Have several of these in my house
customer_reviews.text: Tried several splitters from separate manufacturers and this one worked. I have a pretty complex AV Distribution system throughout my house, I am using this splitter in 8 different places. Most of them are behind a 6x2 HDMI matrix switch so that I can play the source equipment locally without impacting what others may wish to choose in other portions of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Dave M.

customer_reviews.title: Orei bad, Amazon good.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because the one I have doesn't have a power switch and I wanted that feature. The first unit arrived and had a buzz coming from the power supply. It wouldn't turn on or work in any way. I exchanged it and the second unit had the exact same thing going on. Not worth the hassle even though the exchange and return process from Amazon was amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jason P.

customer_reviews.title: Built well. Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it is supposed to do -- turn one hdmi output into two. The screen blacks on both tvs when either tv is turned off or on, or either cable is removed or reinserted. This only lasts about a second. Other than that, its well made and does the job. Its packaged nicely and is made of solid materials. Other than the minimalistic annoyance of the screen blanking I have absolutely no complaints. I would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron J.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great and just bought a spare
customer_reviews.text: This product worked perfectly. The splitter was needed because the cable system (that could televise 4k) its mini box ONLY has 1 hdmi outlet. I needed this amplified splitter to ALSO go to a dvd rercorder (after it too had to pass thru box that converted hdmi to S-video.) BUT nothing could start without the splitter...3 of them actually for 3 t.vs.I have just bought another to have as a spare if one malfunctions
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W.

customer_reviews.title: So Far It's Great
customer_reviews.text: Received splitter, hooked it up to 2 tvs and it worked perfectly even with one tv hooked up with 40ft hdmi cable. Nice small unit. There can always be defective units, but most of the bad reviews appear to be using this splitter incorrectly. If used as it is intended it should work just fine. Read and understand its intended use.
customer_reviews.author: GMAN

customer_reviews.title: Worth Paying a little more
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a similar product to this HDMI Splitter and it was intermittent and a great aggravation. This splitter for a little more than what I payed for the cheap splitter is far better. Good picture quality, does not have any flimsy connections and looks professional. I'm using it for splitting the HDMI out of my cable box putting it into an HDMI to RF device to send an RF signal to the already RF wired parts of my house and my living room TV on the other side. Very Satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID WELLS

customer_reviews.title: great HDMI splitter.... one source 4 output
customer_reviews.text: great product and it work as it should be... connected using Samsung MHL on my Samsung Galaxy Note Edge then to my Pioneer 4000NX plus to my two other monitor both using HDMI connector... it gives quality video without any degration in picture quality. Better than the one i returned at Bestbuy with only two output with almost the same price but didn't work
customer_reviews.author: lhaytz

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product was exactly what I was looking for. I needed to take the output of my Comcast receiver and send it directly to the television AND take the same output and send it to my video/audio surround sound amplifier. The COMCAST receiver only has one HDMI output. Most of the time, I want to watch TV using and listening to the TV’s speakers. But when watching a movie or sports, I like the surround sound that the stereo amp provides. This product solved my problem. It was delivered quickly and setup was super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Works for 4K SDR - Does not work for 4K HDR
customer_reviews.text: I tried two of these to make sure it wan't just a fluke. I am using it with the Apple TV gen 4 - 4K. I split the output so that we can watch in the kitchen as well as the living room. It works on 4K resolution as long as you don't use HDR (high dynamic range). When yu switch to 4K HDR, the input led goes off and there is not signal at either TV. The 4K SDR works OK but I was spoiled by the HDR, and so will be looking for a different lolution
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ronald C. Markham

customer_reviews.title: You gotta be joking me
customer_reviews.text: Well so much for making life easier... just another item to return. I got this so that i could minimize the chaos that comes with running multiple screens on your computer... but i need my computer to also detect multiple screen which it does not when you use this.... so unless you have a reason for multiple screens to all do and display the exact same thing on every single one of them this is not only a trash product its an annoyance. To add insult to injury its "smart" display where it suggests resolution quality is great if you are 85 and need a magnifying glass to see your screen complete nonsense
customer_reviews.author: Chris Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended to! I have about two-three 10ft HDMI cords all linked together (with female-female adapters) running to the monitor I play my Xbox on. Works great and no lag whatsoever! My old one quit working (different brand) so I thought I’d give this a try! Works great on both my monitor and TV. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Folker

customer_reviews.title: It works! Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I looked on the internet for such a long time to find an answer to running 2 TVs in HDMI. I tried a splitter and another advertised splitter, nothing worked. I found this on Amazon, read the comments and when I received it (fast delivery) it was easy and fast to connect. I have Comcast and now both TVs work in HDMi. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne L. Cashman

customer_reviews.title: Fixed HDCP handshake issue
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was having HDCP handshake problems between my Google Fiber box and my Samsung 4K TV (UN65K5900). They are connected via a 25' HDMI cable that runs inside the wall. Before inserting this spliter between them, the sound and/or picture would go out intermittently. I tried cleaning the HDMI contacts and various other things without any results. I know the cable is good because it worked fine with two older Samsung TV's. I have been using this daily for about 3 months now and have had ZERO issues with it! Also, if you're concerned about power consumption, it doesn't use a lot, about 6 watts according to my Efergy E2.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: I should have known better
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I didn’t want to rent another cable box especially because the TVs are so close to each other. This product makes both jumpy and puts a audio glitch into every 15 or so seconds. I’m not blaming the seller. It’s the manufacturer. The item is not worth the price. I’ll just have to get another Cable box.
customer_reviews.author: Hempster

customer_reviews.title: There is a video delay
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use this to split the video output of my switch so I could record some video game clips, but there is a delay in the video so it makes it impossible to play. If you want to split a bluray player or something, it should work fine, but don't get this if you want to split gameplay while you play.
customer_reviews.author: Bryon

customer_reviews.title: No sound, but great picture. Not meant for gaming systems.
customer_reviews.text: For the job needed, it didn't do what I expected. If you are buying this for multiple screens for your PC, this works great. I bought it for a multi media project where I was able to switch between my flat screen and my monitor on my Xbox One, so if need be I could put my security cameras on the big screen during business hours. Picture worked great, just no sound. To be honest, for a gaming system I should've spent the large amount of money for a proven one but hey, I tried. Admittedly, there was NO delay in picture.
customer_reviews.author: Rolf MOTO

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: Prompt delivery. Easy to set up. Works exactly as described. I'm not putting it to any difficult use; just duplicating power point slides onto two TVs. The input is a Miracast direct WiFi receiver which is receiving the display of a Windows computer. I'm using a 25 ft. interconnect HDMI cable. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a splitter, it works.
customer_reviews.text: As said before, it's a splitter. Now, this splitter has durable case, and runs on USB 5V power, so it should be easy to put anywhere. Shows when there is video coming in and passes it just fine. Been using it for a few weeks and never have had a flutter. It's good.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: Great device...works as described. Using it to put a TV in the garage without having to pay for an additional cable box. The instructions say they HDMI cable is limited to 30’ in length. I made the mistake and bought one 35’ in length and it works.
customer_reviews.author: Casey L.

customer_reviews.title: 100’ HDMI run from Splitter to Projector!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this at my church from a MacBook to a tv screen (10’) and a projector (100’) HDMI run. Yes 100 feet and it works, I was skeptical in buying this because of the manufacturer recommendations; nonetheless, from reviews people said to have accomplished the 100’ run and they are correct, it works!
customer_reviews.author: Paul P

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised and great support from manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: I needed to run two HD TV's in a large room facing different directions. Set up was plug and play with no problems. I had a question regarding a switch and their customer support got back to me promptly with the answer. They were also able to send a PDF copy of the user's manual so I did not have to manage paper. Great product and post sales support.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Works where non powered splitter would not
customer_reviews.text: I installed this HDMI powered splitter 3 months ago. There have been no issues with it at all. It is splitting an HDMI signal to two 55" TV's from a computer located about 50' away in the back of the meeting room. The signal is fed to a transmitter VIA HDMI cable then over CAT6 cable to a receiver which is connected VIA HDMI to this splitter. I originally used a non powered splitted. That didn't work, it would only supply the signal to one TV. When I connected this powered splitter both TV's got the signal and been have been working great!
customer_reviews.author: paul Carillet

customer_reviews.title: YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR
customer_reviews.text: I PURCHASED THIS MODEL, 4K 1X4 HDMI SPLITTER 1 IN 4 OUT BY OREI. WORKED PERFECTLY OUT OF THE BOX , RUNNING 50FT HDMI CABLE WITH NO ISSUES you only get what you pay for TRIED ANOTHER BRAND AND ONLY GOT 2 HDMI SIGNALS OUT RETURNED THAT JUNK that cost $18.99
customer_reviews.author: Sandrorie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Bought this about a year ago. When I first used it it work for about a day or two. Then on the one output, the sound would go in and out and then eventually stopped working all together. I tried using multiple different hdmi cords and even a different monitor, nothing worked. Just threw it in my drawer and recently found it again a year later. I tried to set it up again and the power doesn't even work.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product, plug and play
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use, works like a charm. Simply plug in your HDMI in each slot and each will work. LED light will stay on over the slot where the HDMI cable is plugged into to indicate it can register it. It even has an LED for the power supply right where it connects to also check if there's power coming into the unit. The Orei site even has a great video demonstrating this and its practical uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I had a chance to use it for a business meeting and it worked well to split the laptop image to a projector and a large TV used for reference at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: WARNING!!! The splitter cannot do 4k. ...
customer_reviews.text: WARNING!!! The splitter cannot do 4k. Do not buy this itme if you are expecting it to do 4k. It is advertised to do so but it does not work! DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Leo Portillo

customer_reviews.title: Reliable; Worth the money...
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this handy little gadget for 5 months now. Great, reliable product. I have kept this unit on 24-7 and I was worried about it overheating. However, it stays cool with minimal heat. I use this device for a surveillance system and I currently have two monitors connected to it. I have had no problems whatsoever with this product. Thumbs up. Well worth the cash.
customer_reviews.author: B Fish

customer_reviews.title: Now my new TV identifies the PC
customer_reviews.text: I have my PC connected through the receiver system to the TV. My new TV didn't recognize the PC input. I used this splitter to have 1. TV to receive signals and 2. Receiver to amplify the sound. Worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Pkruse45

customer_reviews.title: Love OREI!
customer_reviews.text: I have fallen in love with the OREI branded A/V products. These things are well built using a metal chassis, well packed, and deliver fully on what they promise at a great price. I would recommend to anyone. I have bought multiple of these!
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this product did not work. The LEDs never lit up and i plugged it into several outlets and attached the HDMI cords. No luck. It's a shame I can't return it because I wasn't able to get around to testing it until a month post-delivery
customer_reviews.author: Joe B

customer_reviews.title: the only one can record smartphone game playing
customer_reviews.text: I bought v1.4 version, which works for my elgato HD60S video capture and Huawei mate 9 pro. Because I am using chromecast ultra 4K and the 1.3 version only support 1080p, I was worried about the Splitter 1.4 version does not support bypassing HDCP,but it all works, Thank you very much, Finally get this capture card to work.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Both monitors must watch the same thing.
customer_reviews.text: This unit works very well and was very easy to hook up. Sound quality is very good too. Amazon did however send the wrong thing but it was extremely easy to send it back and the replacement arrived the very next day. I recommend Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: I have this splitting the HDMI cable that comes out of my computer after 1 foot to a TV that is 5 feet of cable away and another that is 75 feet of cable away. Standing between rooms the audio sounds synced as does the video so it seems to be splitting them just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: HDCP bypasser
customer_reviews.text: I used it to bypass the HDCP settings on my PS3 so I could play some older remastered games and stream it to my pc with a elgato card. It works fine but the metal casing of it gets hot and if I’m being fully honest it doesn’t look like 1080p I’m pretty sure it’s 1080i and my settings are all set to 1080p other than that it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Yadago

customer_reviews.title: Working very well for my security cameras.
customer_reviews.text: I liked being able to switch from my smaller TV/camera monitor to my larger TV to have larger camera views. But, I solved that "problem" by purchasing a larger TV to use as my camera monitor. I really don't need a Splitter now, but will keep it...one never knows when one will need it again. Thanks.......LFF
customer_reviews.author: LFF

customer_reviews.title: Did not work from start.
customer_reviews.text: I received this product on April 2nd. I didn't have and extra hdmi cable so I just put it in the drawer to install later. I finally tried to install it a couple of days ago. When I plugged it in nothing worked. Tried another outlet with the same results. Did not work at all. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: mwarnock

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable. I bought this to split the output a ...
customer_reviews.text: Unreliable. I bought this to split the output a DirecTv HD-DVR between TV input and an Xbox One. Worked at first, but quickly became intermittent and outputted "snow" to both devices. I thought the problem might due to some incompatibility between the TV and Xbox input requirements and tried disconnecting each device independently and using it as pass through to the other device. Continued to have the same picture difficulties. The problem could be corrected by only removing power from the unit and then plugging it back in.
customer_reviews.author: JohnEBGud

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this splitter after the HDMI output of my receiver no longer worked but everything else was fine. I just put the HDMI splitter into the DVD player running one output to the receiver for the sound and the other output to the TV for the picture. Worked perfectly. So it was $20 instead of a new $700 receiver. A no brainer thanks to this splitter.
customer_reviews.author: Paul G. Kirkby

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Working great installed in basement, running 4- 25' lines so far (Amazon Basics in wall) and 3' Blue rigger extensions from wall outlet to tv. It works great and am very Happy with picture quality.With added switcher can now switch from Directv to PC on all tv's, loving it.
customer_reviews.author: cmax

customer_reviews.title: Working as expected. We learned a few things
customer_reviews.text: The unit does a great job of giving us two screens. But it works for 'mirroring the screens' with the eact same visual. We have not been able to fuigure out how to "extend" the screens - so we have different information on each screen. This includes utilizing teh screen setting on the PC.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Died after 5 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: I liked this device while it worked. It did exactly what i needed it to do since my Denon receiver only had 1 HDMI output and i had a projector and a HD TV that i wanted to have connected. Lasted 5 weeks and then out of the blue, just stopped working. The device was not able to be powered on...i tried changing the AC adapter and still did not work.
customer_reviews.author: ascotinmpls

customer_reviews.title: Clear pictures, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. Clear picture, easy to install. I use it to send HDMI to 2 TV’s and the picture looks great on both. I bought this one for 2 specific reasons; the info specifically said it’s for 1 IN and 2 OUT. Others just said “HDMI splitter”. Also I wanted one requiring a power supply. I’ve read this makes clearer more stable pictures than non-powered units.
customer_reviews.author: Randy F

customer_reviews.title: Great product and good value!
customer_reviews.text: It works great 90% of the times. every once in a while the HDMI go crazy when you turn a TV on while one was on for a while. However, overall it works well i had a different product before that i had to replace because the it was too sensitive to the different TV sizes and video standards
customer_reviews.author: Guido Brusa

customer_reviews.title: Works Like a Charm!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to split the HDMI signal from my Xbox One to our main and treadmill TVs. So far, it's worked like a charm. The picture quality is excellent on both TVs. You can't beat the price, either!
customer_reviews.author: Romans 10:9-10

customer_reviews.title: I am satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The product is working fine, used to split one HD Flow between 2 TVs.
customer_reviews.author: shuwu1010

customer_reviews.title: We have two televisions and this splitter works wonderfully well. It took just minutes to set it ...
customer_reviews.text: We have two televisions and this splitter works wonderfully well. It took just minutes to set it up and it worked as described. It's nice to see that a product does what it is advertised to do. The splitter arrived quickly and we appreciated the great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Unger

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I expected to be able to turn on my cable box and watch either of two televisions on the selected cable station. For some reason, both tvs must be on or neither one will show. Doesn't make sense.
customer_reviews.author: George Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great HDMI splitter with extra functionality
customer_reviews.text: If you just use this to simple split a signal to two displays, it'll work perfectly. It also has a little slider switch for the EDID, which it can copy from the first output or "auto". Using the copy function I'm able to send 5.1 audio to my receiver, and the video straight to a monitor. Most people won't be using it, but it was a critical function for me, and the price is great. Build quality is very nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for one reason and it wasn’t to split the hdmi. It was to bypass the hdcp error code I was getting. I did some research and read tons of reviews. Basically it’s hit or miss but I figured for the price oh what the heck, The damn thing worked! Bypassed the error going from my roku streaming stick to my old pioneer plasma, basically saving me from buying another tv and allowing me to put the pioneer to use. I definitely say give it a shot!
customer_reviews.author: Martin R.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these and it never turned on, replacement was sent and it didn't split the signal. So it didn't do what it was supposed to. Returned both and will try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: PezMan38

customer_reviews.title: Required when you need two HDMI output from only one HDMI source
customer_reviews.text: This worked well for me as I had one cable box HDMI output but wanted to run my living room TV and my kitchen TV off of one box. I ran a 35 foot cable through the wall and connected it to the OREI HDS-102 1x2. Both TVs look very clear to me there is no discernable signal loss using the OREI HDS-102 1x2.
customer_reviews.author: Gman

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little device. Works like a charm. I received it fast and on time, in fact, in the nick of time it arrived about 30 min before my presentation. I hooked it up and it worked with no problems at all. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: R. Holt

customer_reviews.title: Plug... Play... Enjoy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This splitter did exactly what I needed. I split the “out“ from my cable box (source) with the HDMI splitter and plugged in two separate HDMI cables to the “out” of the splitter and sent them to two different TVs. I now receive the same audio and video to two different locations with NO video or audio degradation... Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works !!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the device; well made, small and compact and it work as described. The presentation videos sold me on this product. Good job guys. I used the device to connect two monitors from my labtop, simple hook up.
customer_reviews.author: aPt

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time’s a charm!
customer_reviews.text: The first one I received was defective, but the return was painless and a replacement sent out quickly. The replacement works flawlessly! Used it to put the big fight on two screens.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Jury still out on this HDMI splitter
customer_reviews.text: I am still testing this unit as I have only had it a week however it does not consistently negotiate the HDMI handshake with my TV or Slingbox (which is why I got it). Some times it works some times it doesn't. Plus no phone numbers for support in the documentation or on their website.
customer_reviews.author: Gengiskwan

customer_reviews.title: Best Money I Ever Spent...
customer_reviews.text: This splitter works GREAT. I had bought a more expensive HDMI Splitter, twice this size with four EDID paddle switches and my TV were a constant problem. Sound with no picture sometimes and if you turned on the second TV the picture would go out on the other TV (sometimes). I tried every different EDID settings and no improvement. Finally I ordered this REI splitter and all my problems were solved. The splitter works flawlessly. I highly recommend this splitter.
customer_reviews.author: STEVEN E ALLEN

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with two output connected. Waste.
customer_reviews.text: It meant to be a splitter, right? But if you connect HDMI cables to both output same time, one of them not working, but it work with only one output. Totally a waste. Missed return window. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Yang Zhao

customer_reviews.title: Strips HDCP for elgato HD60S
customer_reviews.text: Had to do lots of fiddling, but so long as you don't connect it to anything but your elgato on the output end, it'll strip the HDCP signal. I use this to speedrun Mario 64 through my Denon receiver. Gotta leave it on Auto. Pretty good device. Has a nice weight to it. Just hope it lives long.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Montes

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This device works exactly as described. I'm using it to split the signal from an Xbox One S. The Xbox is located where the controllers are in range of 2 different rooms. Now I can play Halo in the other room when the someone is watching TV in the living room. Priorities!!
customer_reviews.author: JustMe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 3D Pass through
customer_reviews.text: I am using DENON 2310 receiver which supports upto HDMI 1.3a. Recently i bought EPSON 3D projector for which my receiver doesn't support 3D Pass through. So i bought this splitter and connected my the output of my 3D Bluray player as input to this splitter and one of the output from the splitter connected to my 3D projector and the other output connected to receiver. I could able to view 3D movies and hear the perfect HD audio by using this device.(otherwise i need to buy a 3D compatible receiver in order to passthrough the 3D content to my projector rather this splitter did the job simply saving my money) Really i love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Srirama Krishnan

customer_reviews.title: Worth a shot.
customer_reviews.text: Solved my problem. Split hdmi to run DTV in two rooms. (No a/v, just tvs.) Used splitter to an 8' to wallplate, through attic at 35' then a wallplate to an 8' in the other room. Other split is at 8'. Hdmi stuff is very finicky. Not running 4k. This of course is same channel on both-but thats all we need. Worked great for me!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Loiacano

customer_reviews.title: NOTED IMPROVEMENT WITH THE HDS-104 over the HDS-102
customer_reviews.text: This is modeled directly off the 2-port HDS-102 with 1 huge improvement. When one port is already in use, and a device that is on another port is powered up, it does NOT interrupt the streamed data as the 102 did. NOTE to connecting a new device to Splitter, turn OFF the HDS-104 while any cable is inserted or removed, THEN it is ok to power back up.
customer_reviews.author: Solar Specialist

customer_reviews.title: sinple and straight forward
customer_reviews.text: I plugged power adapter in, ran 2 hdmi cables to 2 different Tv's plugged the hdmi cable into the input from my cable adapter and there is was doing it's job. I had a clear picture on both tv's. one in the front room and 1 in the bedroom via a 25 ft. Hdm cable.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Oneto

customer_reviews.title: Mirror an image from one monitor to another monitor
customer_reviews.text: Performed as advertised for a reasonable price. It was easy to install and did not require tech support. Allows you to mirror an existing TV channel to a separate device.
customer_reviews.author: Cisco

customer_reviews.title: Good HDMI Splitter
customer_reviews.text: It needs to be AC connection to work. It shows the same picture on both monitors. I am using with it monitors. I don't see image degrading with the 2 monitors.
customer_reviews.author: Silvermouse

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I've installed a lot of these - never had a problem; they always get along with other switches and multiple TVs and cable run lengths... So far, so very good.
customer_reviews.author: Woodlandsman

customer_reviews.title: That has been reliable for 18 months
customer_reviews.text: No Frills HDMI splitter that we've been running constantly on for over 18 months with no problems. No video signal problems or issues so far
customer_reviews.author: FM

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Last
customer_reviews.text: I used this for 3 months. All of a sudden i lost the picture. So i had to back track on my TV connections and Onkyo Receiver to where the problem emanated from. Well it was the splitter.
customer_reviews.author: Mister Gadget

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Stuck at home, running most of the house from the generator due to high winds, AND no internet because the storm took that out too. Installed the product in under a minute. Fired up my hot spot and now I'm kicking back watching a very high resolution picture on my smart TV while being able to drive my computer from the keyboard instead of messing around with the archaic keyboard tied to my TV remote. Nice job folks!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P.

customer_reviews.title: A big problem solved.
customer_reviews.text: Tried far too many different approaches to the problem. Splitter cables, dumb switch boxes and diy solutions. This made it easy to hook up two monitors. One dig is the led only turns on when there is a video signal, thought it was a power on indicator.
customer_reviews.author: K. McQuarters

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't split all signals. Only splits 1 time. Main screen showed 1 image but other 2 screens showed same image. I emailed tech support and no response. Very disappointed in product did not perform as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Laura K Bane

customer_reviews.title: Worked !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Working awesome ..... we wanted to add another tv to our gym running off one cable box... they call this mirroring !!! So far so good excellent picture & sound ....
customer_reviews.author: Greg D.

customer_reviews.title: RELIABLE
customer_reviews.text: I've had a pair of these in place for six months now, running 24/7 with zero issues. Thoroughly impressed. Worth the premium price as opposed to knock-offs.
customer_reviews.author: Toast

customer_reviews.title: Hit and miss with product!
customer_reviews.text: Had to return 2 that stopped working. 1 when we first received it and the second after a few months. The second one was returned directly to OREI, which they can not find and I probably will never see the replacement. Will have to find a different brand to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff & Angie DeSpain

customer_reviews.title: Failed in less than a year.
customer_reviews.text: This let me down. I've had it for a while, working perfectly. All the sudden, the TVs periodically lose signal. It's only about a second, but it's enough. I thought it was the cable but the DVR recordings don't have the signal losses that show up on the TV. I finally unplugged the splitter and plugged the DVR back into the TV with no splitter. No lost signal anymore. Put it back in the splitter, the signal losses start again. It really shouldn't have failed this soon. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: W. Wynne

customer_reviews.title: Mirror your monitor to another screen or TV
customer_reviews.text: I use this to mirror my computer screen to a larger TV on another wall. When I'm watching online TV, YouTube, or training videos, it works great. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Creed

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, quality product
customer_reviews.text: solid, sturdy, quality product. hard metal frame, sleek, durable design. and it resolves the PS4 pro blackout issue! I was feeding my PS4 pro to a 4k television and a 1080 Projector via a big cumbersome receiver with 2 zones. I have replace that gigantic amplifier with this tiny box, and it does the job even better, without the glitches, or even the need for me to turn it on. when I turn on both screens, the PS4 pro successfully downscales to 1080 and mirrors the display to both monitors. turn off the projector and the PS4 is automatically able to switch back to 4k for the TV. very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew H.

product_meta.title: Orei 4K 1x8 HDMI Splitter 1 in 8 Out by OREI - Ultra HD @ 30 Hz 1x8 Ver. 1.4 HDCP, Power HDMI Supports 3D Full HD 1080P for Xbox, PS4 PS3 Fire Stick Blu Ray Apple TV HDTV - Adapter Included
product_meta.description: Size:1x8 HDMI SplitterThe Orei HDS-108 1x8 HDMI Splitter will take any HDMI signal and duplicate the signal, sending the same high definition signal to 8 displays simultaneously. The HDS-102 supports Ultra HD 4K/2K resolutions and all 3D resolutions. Product Features: - excellent quality - the heavy-duty cool metal enclosure protects the insides and keeps the unit cool by aiding in quick heat absorption and dissipation. - 2 x HDMI outputs supporting up to V1. 4a - 1 x HDMI input supporting up to V1. 3B and 1440p - Supported Audio: LPCM, Dolby-AC3, DTS7. 1, DSD/Dolby True HD/DTS-HD Master Audio - essentially all available audio options are supported- video format: deep color 480I/ 576I/ 480p/ 576p/ 720p/ 1080I/ 1080p/ 1440I/ 1440p - eidi Duration: 6 seconds specification: - Product type: HDMI 1x2 splitter - Interface Type: 1 HDMI in, 2 HDMI out- Power supply: DC 5V (included)
feature_bullets: Split one HDMI input signal to eight HDMI output signals identical to the input signal without any loss in quality. 1 Input source such as a blue ray player can display on to 8 source to 8 TVs.
Supported Audio: LPCM, Dolby-AC3, DTS7. 1, DSD/Dolby/DTS-HD master Audio, Essentially all available audio options are supported
Support Ultra HD 3840 x 2160 resolution & 3D, deep Color 30bit, 36bit, Blu-ray 24/50/60FS/Vic
Hdcp 1. 2 protocol Compliant; support output HDMI 1. 4V
Package included: (1)HDMI 1x8 Splitter x 1. (2)5V AC Adapter x 1. (3)User Manual x 1
